thread.section_title: FC-Moto.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von FC-Moto.de | www.fc-moto.de
thread.title: Heath Morrison

author: Heath Morrison
title: Heath Morrison
text: This is my second order with FC Moto and in both experiences i have been very satisfied with the service and products. The only area that i have ever felt could do with improvement is in the area of status updates and parcel tracking. Ordering online can leave a customer feeling at risk of not receiving their order and it would be great to get more status and tracking feedback throughout the order process. But overall i am very happy with FC Moto and will definitely order more products through them in the future.
